mapper.select: SELECT n.news_idx, n.news_title, n.news_thumbnail_image, n.news_content, n.news_count, n.news_createAt, n.news_updateAt, m.mem_idx AS reporter_mem_idx, m.mem_name AS reporter_name, m.mem_nickname AS reporter_nickname FROM MEMBER u JOIN SUBSCRIBE s ON u.mem_idx = s.mem_idx JOIN NEWS n ON s.reporter_idx = n.mem_idx JOIN MEMBER m ON n.mem_idx = m.mem_idx WHERE u.mem_idx = #{mem_idx};
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO news values( seq_news_idx.nextval, #{news_title}, #{news_thumbnail_image}, #{news_content}, 0, default, null, #{mem_idx}, #{category_idx} )
SELECT seq_news_idx.CURRVAL from dual
mapper.delete: delete from news where news_idx=#{ news_idx }
mapper.update: update news set news_title = #{news_title}, news_thumbnail_image = #{news_thumbnail_image}, news_content = #{news_content}, news_updateAt = sysdate, category_idx = #{category_idx} where news_idx=#{news_idx}
